TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSFederationAuthenticationModule extends System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase

summary.span: 是 HTTP 模組，會藉由強制執行連入要求的聯合驗證設定，用來保護 ASP.NET 應用程式。

span.span: The is an HTTP module which is used to secure an ASP.NET application by enforcing federated authentication settings on incoming requests.

summary.span: 是 WIF 現成提供的主要模組，用於處理 ASP.NET 應用程式中的宣告式識別存取。

span.span: The is the main module that WIF offers out of the box for handling claims-based identity access in ASP.NET applications.

summary.span: 會引發數個事件，它可讓 ASP.NET 開發人員變更預設行為，並控制驗證和宣告處理發生方式的詳細資訊。

span.span: The raises several events, which allows ASP.NET developers to change the default behavior and control the details of how authentication and claims processing take place.

summary.span: 功能會分為特定工作的方法。

span.span: The functionality is divided into task-specific methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作 HTTP 模組已知為 WS-同盟驗證模組 (WSFAM)。The class implements an HTTP module known as the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM). WSFAM 會實作內建 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF)。The WSFAM is implemented out of the box by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF). WSFAM 會在 web.config 檔案中建立一個項目新增至 ASP.NET 管線。The WSFAM is added to the ASP.NET pipeline by making an entry in the web.config file. 它衍生自，它會實作。It derives from , which implements . 它會向 ASP.NET 執行階段來接聽和事件。It registers with the ASP.NET runtime to listen for the and events. 接聽事件，可讓用戶端重新導向至安全性權杖服務 (STS) 取得安全性權杖，授權要求的資源上失敗時 WSFAM。Listening to the event, lets the WSFAM redirect clients to a security token service (STS) to obtain a security token when authorization fails on a requested resource. 接聽事件可讓 WSFAM 來監視 HTTP 要求包含要求的權杖從 STS 的回應。Listening to the event enables the WSFAM to monitor HTTP requests for a response from the STS that contains the requested token. 這類權杖存在且有效時，它會建立的執行個體通過驗證的使用者使用的權杖中的宣告。When such a token is present and valid, it creates an instance of for the authenticated user using the claims that are present in the token. 工作階段驗證模組 (SAM)，也就是執行個體時使用 WSFAM，提供工作階段管理的從中衍生的類別或類別。When using the WSFAM, session management is provided by a session authentication module (SAM), which is an instance of the class, or a class derived from it. SAM 也會加入至組態檔中的 ASP.NET 管線。The SAM is also added to the ASP.NET pipeline in the configuration file. SAM 監視 （工作階段） 的驗證 cookie 的要求。The SAM monitors requests for authentication (session) cookies. 當這些 cookie 存在且有效，此模組會擷取通過驗證的使用者，從並設定屬性和執行緒主體屬性。When these cookies are present and valid, the module extracts the for the authenticated user from the and sets the property and the thread principal properties. WSFAM 會提供：The WSFAM provides: - 提供 ASP.NET 應用程式將驗證外包給安全性權杖服務 (STS) 所使用的 WS-同盟通訊協定的能力。The ability for an ASP.NET application to outsource authentication to a security token service (STS) by using the WS-Federation protocol. 可以跨一或多個身分識別領域同盟身分識別，並牽涉到多個 Sts。Identity can be federated across one or more identity realms and involve multiple STSs. - ASP.NET 應用程式的宣告型識別。Claims-based identity for ASP.NET applications. 在驗證期間，WSFAM 會建置從 STS 所傳送的安全性權杖中宣告的主體，並將此宣告主體設定為執行緒主體。During authentication, the WSFAM builds a principal from the claims in the security token sent by the STS and sets this claims principal as the thread principal. 您接著可以使用此主體進行後續授權、 展示和邏輯決策，它代表的使用者的相關程式碼中。You can then use this principal to make further authorization, presentation, and logic decisions about the user it represents in your code. WSFAM 會公開一些提供預設来使用的 WS-同盟登入和登出要求的訊息參數的屬性。The WSFAM exposes several properties that provide default message parameters to use on WS-Federation sign-in and sign-out requests. 這些屬性通常初始化自[ <wsFederation> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md)組態檔中的項目。These properties are typically initialized from the [<wsFederation>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md) element in a configuration file. 這些屬性的最重要的是：The most important of these properties are: - 屬性，指定要將 WS-同盟登入和登出要求傳送的安全性權杖服務 (STS) 的位址。The property, which specifies the address of the security token service (STS) to which to send WS-Federation sign-in and sign-out requests. - 屬性，在 WS-同盟登入要求中指定要使用的 wtrealm 參數。The property, which specifies the wtrealm parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests. Wtrealm 參數識別的安全性領域，STS 的信賴憑證者 (rp) 應用程式。The wtrealm parameter identifies the security realm of the relying party (RP) application to the STS. 登入訊息參數也可以變更每個要求提供事件處理常式委派事件。Sign-in message parameters can also be changed on a per-request basis by providing an event-handler delegate for the event. 兩個屬性控制模組的行為。Two properties control the behavior of the module. 這兩個屬性通常也是初始化自``組態中的項目。Both of these properties are also typically initialized from the `` element in configuration. - 屬性會指定模組是否應該執行被動式重新導向至 STS 進行驗證。The property specifies whether the module should perform passive redirects to the STS for authentication. - 屬性會指定是否應持續性工作階段。The property specifies whether sessions should be persistent. 如果這個屬性設定為 true，SAM 會使用工作階段 cookie 寫入用戶端。If this property is set true, the SAM is used to write a session cookie to the client. 在從用戶端的後續要求，SAM 會提供使用權杖驗證會保存在工作階段 cookie。On subsequent requests from the client, the SAM provides authentication by using the token persisted in the session cookie. WSFAM 會引發數個事件在登入時，登出，可讓 ASP.NET 開發人員，以變更模組的預設行為，並控制如何驗證和宣告處理發生的詳細資料。The WSFAM raises several events during sign-in and sign-out, which allow ASP.NET developers to change the default behavior of the module and control the details of how authentication and claims processing take place. WS-同盟登入要求傳送至 STS 前，會引發下列事件：The following events are raised before the WS-Federation sign-in request is sent to the STS: - ： 當被動式重新導向已啟用，且要求的資源上的授權失敗時引發。: Raised when passive redirect is enabled and authorization fails on a requested resource. - ： 之前引發 WSFAM 會傳送至 STS WS-同盟登入要求。: Raised just before the WSFAM sends the WS-Federation sign-in request to the STS. 若要變更的登入要求中的參數，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to change the parameters in the sign-in request. 從 STS 收到登入回應 （發出安全性權杖），則會引發下列事件：The following events are raised when a sign-in response (issued security token) is received from the STS: - ： 只在 STS 所傳送的安全性權杖從回應讀取之後，才引發。: Raised just after the security token sent by the STS is read from the response. - ： 只在驗證權杖之後，才引發。: Raised just after the token has been validated. 您可以使用這個事件來篩選、 轉換，或將宣告新增至宣告主體 () 建立的安全性權杖。You can use this event to filter, transform, or add claims to the claims principal () created from the security token. - ： 工作階段權杖之前引發 () 從目前的使用者與主體可用來設定執行緒主體的宣告會建立並寫入至工作階段 cookie。: Raised just before the session token () created from the claims principal is used to set the thread principal and current user and is written to the session cookie. 可讓您有機會修改的工作階段權杖或啟用或停用撰寫工作階段 cookie。Gives you an opportunity to modify the session token or enable or disable writing the session cookie. - ： 在結束時引發的驗證之後已設定執行緒主體和目前使用者。: Raised at the end of the authentication just after the thread principal and current user have been set. - ： 引發在登入期間發生的例外狀況。: Raised if an exception occurs during sign-in. 您可以取消要求，並防止例外狀況傳回給呼叫端。You can cancel the request and prevent the exception from being returned to the caller. 簽署時登出工作階段，或處理的 WS-同盟登出清除要求 (wsignoutcleanup1.0) 時，會引發下列事件：When signing out of a session or when processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request (wsignoutcleanup1.0), the following events are raised: - ： 只在工作階段遭到刪除，讓您執行任何可能相依於工作階段的清除作業，或取消登出之前，才引發。: Raised just before the session is deleted to enable you to perform any cleanup that might depend on the session or to cancel sign-out. - ： 只在工作階段已被刪除之後，才引發。: Raised just after the session has been deleted. - ： 引發登出期間發生的例外狀況。您可以取消登出，並防止例外狀況傳回給呼叫端。: Raised if an exception occurs during sign-out. You can cancel sign-out and prevent the exception from being returned to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 當登出在 STS 藉由呼叫登出事件不會引發方法。The sign-out events are not raised when signing out at the STS by calling the method. 有兩種登入使用 WSFAM STS。There are two ways of signing in to an STS using WSFAM. 第一種是藉由啟用被動式重新導向透過屬性。The first is by enabling passive redirects through the property. 在此情況下，當授權失敗要求的資源，而不會傳回`401:Access Denied`回應給用戶端，WSFAM 建置其屬性的 WS-同盟登入要求訊息，並將用戶端重新導向至 STS 擷取安全性權杖。In this case, when authorization fails on a requested resource, rather than returning a `401:Access Denied` response to the client, WSFAM builds a WS-Federation sign-in request message from its properties and redirects the client to the STS to retrieve a security token. 第二種方式是明確地將 sts 的用戶端重新導向藉由呼叫從網頁或應用程式中的自訂控制項的方法。The second way is to explicitly redirect the client to the STS by calling the method from a web page or custom control in your application. 方法也使用 WSFAM 的屬性來建構的登入要求。The method also uses the properties of the WSFAM to construct the sign-in request. 任何多載方法可用來登出工作階段。Any of the overloaded methods can be used to sign out of the session. 這會刪除用戶端上的工作階段 cookie。This deletes the session cookie on the client. 它不會傳送至 STS WS-同盟登出訊息 ("wsignout1.0")。It does not send a WS-Federation sign-out message ("wsignout1.0") to the STS. 若要登出在 STS，您必須使用方法。To sign-out at the STS, you must use the method. WSFAM 會刪除其工作階段與用戶端，以處理 WS-同盟登出清除要求 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")。The WSFAM handles WS-Federation sign-out clean-up requests ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), by deleting its session with the client. 如果未設定登出清除訊息的 wreply 參數，WSFAM 會傳回至傳送訊息的 STS 綠色的核取記號的映像。If the wreply parameter in the sign-out clean-up message is not set, the WSFAM returns an image of a green check mark to the STS that sent the message. 這項功能可供 STS 以 RP 已完成其登出通知的形式。This feature can be used by an STS as an acknowledgment that the RP has completed its sign-out. WSFAM 會公開其功能，比方說，其要求處理管線，透過幾個特定工作的方法。The WSFAM exposes its functionality -- for example, its request processing pipeline -- through several task-specific methods. 您可以覆寫這些方法，以變更 WSFAM 行為的衍生類別中。You can override these methods in derived classes to alter the behavior of the WSFAM. 要使用此模組必須加入至管線，如下列 XML 所示：To be used, the module must be added to the pipeline as in the following XML: ``` ``` 設定後，引發事件的處理 HTTP 要求的各種階段。Once configured, the raises events at various stages of processing an HTTP request. ASP.NET 開發人員可以處理這些事件在 global.asax 檔案中。ASP.NET developers can handle these events in the global.asax file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wauth 參數是選擇性的。The wauth parameter is optional. 如果屬性設定為`null`或登入要求中未包含空字串，wauth 參數。If the property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wauth parameter is not included in the sign-in request. 您可以藉由新增的處理常式覆寫這項設定在每個 HTTP 要求事件。You can override this setting on each HTTP request by adding a handler for the event. 此模組會重新導向至安全性權杖服務 (STS) 使用 WS-同盟登入要求訊息之前，會引發這個事件。This event is raised just before the module redirects to the security token service (STS) with a WS-Federation sign-in request message. 所指定的 STS屬性。The STS is specified by the property.

summary.span: 當模組正在判斷它是否應該將使用者重新導向至已設定的簽發者進行驗證時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the module is determining whether it should redirect the user to the configured issuer to authenticate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 授權失敗的 HTTP 要求時，會引發事件。The event is raised when authorization has failed for an HTTP request. 會引發此事件內在透過呼叫的事件處理常式委派方法。It is raised from within the event-handler delegate through a call to the method. 您可以設定屬性，即可控制是否已重新導向至識別提供者。You can set the property to control whether the request is redirected to the identity provider. 架構會初始化此屬性為`false`如果使用者尚未通過驗證。The framework initializes this property to `false` if the user has already been authenticated. 在此情況下，將屬性設定為`true`與 STS 可能會造成循環迴圈。In this case, setting the property to `true` may cause a circular loop with the STS. > [!NOTE] > 事件可用來修改 URL，或 [取消] 重新導向。The event can be used to modify the URL or cancel the redirect. 若要處理此 ASP.NET 應用程式中的事件，建立名為`WSFederationAuthentication_AuthorizationFailed`global.asax 檔案中。To handle this event in an ASP.NET application, create a method named `WSFederationAuthentication_AuthorizationFailed` in the global.asax file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會叫用從要求處理管線，以判斷連入 HTTP 要求是否為表單 post，其中包含 WS-同盟登入回應訊息。This method is invoked from the request processing pipeline to determine whether the incoming HTTP request is a FORM post that contains a WS-Federation sign-in response message. 它會叫用多載`onPage`參數集`false`來指示在處理網頁時，不是呼叫。It invokes the overload with the `onPage` parameter set `false` to indicate that the call did not originate while processing a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會叫用要求處理管線，透過從多載來判斷內送的 HTTP 要求是否為表單 POST，其中包含 WS-同盟登入回應訊息。This method is invoked from the request processing pipeline through the overload to determine whether the incoming HTTP request is a form POST that contains a WS-Federation sign-in response message. 預設實作會執行下列作業：The default implementation performs the following: - 如果內送要求表單 POST，它會呼叫方法，以判斷是否表單 POST 中包含登入回應。If the incoming request is a form POST, it calls the method to determine whether the form POST contains a sign-in response. - 如果連入要求不是表單 POST，且此要求包含 WS-同盟登出清除要求 （wa 參數為"wsignoutcleanup1.0"），則會執行登出的清除工作。If the incoming request is not a form POST, and the request contains a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request (the wa parameter is "wsignoutcleanup1.0"), sign-out clean-up is performed. 在此情況下，叫用方法 (參數設定為`true`來指出登出清除) 若要登出工作階段。In this case, the method is invoked (with the parameter set to `true` to indicate a sign-out clean-up) to sign out of the session. 這也會造成要引發的登出事件。This also causes the sign-out events to be raised. 接下來，如果登出清除要求包含 wreply 參數，用戶端重新導向至所傳回的 URL方法; 否則綠色的核取記號的映像會傳回至 STS。Next, if the sign-out clean-up request contains a wreply parameter, the client is redirected to the URL returned by the method; otherwise, an image of a green check mark is returned to the STS. 此映像的回條可用 sts 確認登出清除要求已收到並順利處理 RP。The receipt of this image can be used by the STS as a confirmation that the sign-out clean-up request was received and successfully processed by the RP.

The WS-Federation sign-in request message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立表示 WS-同盟登入要求物件。Creates a WS-Federation sign-in request that is represented by a object. 新屬性物件設定，如下所示：The properties of the new object are set as follows: - 屬性 （wctx 參數） 設定為建立使用方法參數的值。The property (the wctx parameter) is set to a value created by using the method parameters. - 屬性 （wct 參數） 設定為目前的時間。The property (the wct parameter) is set to the current time. - 使用目前的執行個體的對等的屬性會設定所有其他屬性。All other properties are set by using the equivalent properties of the current instance. 傳遞給方法的參數用來建立訊息 wctx 參數。The parameters passed to the method are used to create the wctx message parameter. 這是以下列格式的字串： `ru=returnUrl&cx=SignInContext&rm=rememberMeSet&id=uniqueId`。This is a string with the following format: `ru=returnUrl&cx=SignInContext&rm=rememberMeSet&id=uniqueId`. - `ru`值設定的值為`returnUrl`參數傳遞至方法，而且它會指定模組應該導向到下列的成功驗證的瀏覽器的 URL。The `ru` value is set to the value of the `returnUrl` parameter passed in to the method and it specifies the URL that the module should direct the browser to following successful authentication. 這是唯一的值儲存在由 WSFAM wctx 字串。This is the only value stored in the wctx string that is used by the WSFAM. 此模組會呼叫處理 WS-同盟登入回應時，從 wctx 參數中擷取此值的方法。The module calls the method to extract this value from the wctx parameter when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response. 不應混淆 wreply 訊息參數，以指定屬性並提供安全性權杖服務 (STS) 應將其回應導向的 RP 的位址。It should not be confused with the wreply message parameter, which is specified by the property and which provides the address at the RP to which the security token service (STS) should direct its response. - `cx`參數設定的值為屬性。The `cx` parameter is set to the value of the property. 此屬性的出現可讓您設定任何應用程式定義的內容應該是儲存在 wctx 字串;不過，WSFAM 不會公開方法以擷取回應中的這個值。This property is exposed to enable you to set any application-defined context that should be stored in the wctx string; however, WSFAM does not expose a method to extract this value in the response. 如果您的應用程式需要此值，您必須提供程式碼來剖析 wctx 字串和處理回應時讀取這個值。If the value is needed by your application, you must provide the code to parse the wctx string and read this value when processing the response. 您可能會覆寫來達成此方法。You might accomplish this by overriding the method. - 既不`rm`設為值的值`rememberMeSet`參數，也不`id`參數的值為`uniqueId`WSFAM 所使用參數。Neither the `rm` value, which is set to the value of the `rememberMeSet` parameter, nor the `id` parameter, which is set to the value of the `uniqueId` parameter are used by WSFAM. 這些可以設定為任何值。These can be set to any value. 方法從呼叫方法。The method is called from the method.

summary.span: 使用 WS-同盟通訊協定在指定的安全性權杖服務 (STS) 登出。

span.span: Signs out at the specified security token service (STS) by using the WS-Federation protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法，以將 WS-同盟登出要求訊息傳送至指定的 STS。Call this method to send a WS-Federation sign-out request message to the specified STS. 您可以選擇性地提供在登出要求 wreply 參數的值。You can optionally supply a value for the wreply parameter in the sign-out request. 方法會執行下列動作：The method does the following: 1. 使用指定的參數，建立 Ws-federation 登出要求訊息。Creates a WS-Federation sign-out request message by using the specified parameters. 2. 呼叫方法來刪除工作階段 cookie SAM。Calls the method on the SAM to delete the session cookie. 3. 重新導向至 STS 的使用中的第一個步驟的登出要求訊息。Redirects to the STS using the sign-out request message from the first step. 沒有登出事件： ， ，或由這個方法所引發。None of the sign-out events: , , or are raised by this method. 若要刪除的工作階段，而不需要登出要求訊息傳送至 STS，呼叫其中一個多載方法。To delete the session without sending a sign-out request message to the STS, call one of the overloaded methods. > [!NOTE] > 若要使用的工作階段權杖，以執行被動登出，模組會依賴儲存在值屬性在登入時，如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法。To perform passive sign-out by using the session token, the module relies on a value that was stored in the property during sign-in, for more information, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從 要求處理管線會呼叫這個方法 (方法) 以取得成功登入之後的信賴憑證者的合作對象 (RP) 將用戶端導向頁面的 URL。This method is called from the request processing pipeline (the method) to get the URL of the page at the relying party (RP) to direct the client to after successful sign-in. 這是，一般而言，RP 的用戶端原先要求的資源存取的 URL。This is, typically, the URL of the RP resource to which the client originally requested access. 根據預設，WSFAM 會儲存在 wctx 訊息參數的傳回 URL，WS-同盟登入要求傳送到安全性權杖服務 (STS) 時。By default, WSFAM saves the return URL inside the wctx message parameter when it sends the WS-Federation sign-in request to the security token service (STS). Wctx 參數保留跨實體透過此訊息傳遞，而且是根據 WS-同盟規格，STS 所傳送的 WS-同盟登入回應訊息中原封不動地傳回。In accordance with the WS-Federation specification, the wctx parameter is preserved across entities through which the message passes and is returned unaltered in the WS-Federation sign-in response message that is sent by the STS. 預設實作會取得從登入回應中的 wctx 參數的傳回 URL。The default implementation gets the return URL from the wctx parameter in the sign-in response. WSFAM 會使用的 wctx 參數格式的相關資訊，請參閱方法。For more information about the format of the wctx parameter that is used by WSFAM, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從呼叫要求處理管線，以判斷要在處理 WS-同盟登出清除要求之後，重新導向至的 URL 中的方法。This method is called from the method in the request processing pipeline to determine the URL to redirect to after processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request. 它才會叫用如果訊息的 wreply 參數 (`signOutMessage`參數具有屬性，則不`null`或空)。It is only invoked if the message has a wreply parameter (the `signOutMessage` parameter has a property that is neither `null` nor empty). 預設實作會驗證訊息中包含的回覆 URL (屬性) 針對安全性權杖服務 (STS) 所指定的位址屬性。The default implementation validates the reply URL contained in the message (the property) against the address of the security token service (STS) that is specified by the property. 下列條件必須為有效的回覆 url，則為 true:The following conditions must be true for the reply URL to be valid: 1. 回覆 URL 是絕對 URL。The reply URL is an absolute URL. 2. 回覆 URL 有相同的結構描述為簽發者。The reply URL has the same scheme as the issuer. 3. 回覆 URL 有相同的連接埠為簽發者。The reply URL has the same port as the issuer. 4. 回覆 URL 與簽發者相同的主機或回覆 URL 會指定簽發者的子網域。Either the reply URL has the same host as the issuer or the reply URL specifies a sub-domain of the issuer. 如果所有這些條件都為 true，會傳回回覆 URL (Reply);否則，所指定的 URL會傳回屬性。If all of these conditions are true, the reply URL (Reply) is returned; otherwise, the URL specified by the property is returned. 覆寫此方法以提供額外的回覆 URL 的驗證。Override this method to provide additional validation for the reply URL.

summary.span: 處理來自 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 管線的 事件。

span.span: Handles the event from the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會實作 WS-同盟要求處理管線。The method implements the WS-Federation request processing pipeline. 它會新增至中的事件[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]管線由方法。It is added to the event in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline by the method. 此方法會執行下列作業：The method performs the following: 1. 呼叫方法，以判斷是否已收到的 WS-同盟登入回應訊息 ("wsignin1.0")。Calls the method to determine whether a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") has been received. 如果回應是 WS-同盟登出清除要求 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")處理訊息，會終止要求，並在要求中的 WS-同盟參數根據用戶端重新導向。If the response is a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), processes the message, terminates the request and redirects the client according to the WS-Federation parameters in the request. 如果訊息不是將登入回應或登出清除要求，此模組只會傳回;否則它會執行下列步驟，以處理登入回應。If the message is not a sign-in response or a sign-out clean-up request, the module just returns; otherwise it performs the following steps to process the sign-in response. 2. 呼叫方法來還原序列化從要求的物件。Calls the method to deserialize a object from the request. 3. 引發 事件。Raises the event. 您可以取消進一步處理，或修改此事件處理常式中的已接收的安全性權杖。You can cancel further processing or modify the received security token in a handler for this event. 處理常式通常用來修改或屬性。A handler is typically used to modify the or properties. 4. 驗證安全性權杖，並建立從安全性權杖中宣告的物件。Validates the security token and creates a object from the claims in the security token. 5. 引發 事件。Raises the event. 您可以取消進一步處理，或修改這個事件處理常式中的宣告主體。You can cancel further processing or modify the claims principal in a handler for this event. 6. 若要建立會使用設定的工作階段驗證模組 (SAM)物件。Uses the configured session authentication module (SAM) to create a object. (在設定 sam所傳回的物件屬性。)使用步驟 5 中所傳回的宣告主體建立的工作階段權杖。(The configured SAM is the object returned by the property.) The session token is created by using the claims principal returned in step 5. 及屬性使用設定的並的屬性步驟 3 中所傳回，並會根據目前時間與任一所指定的權杖存留期驗證或是屬性WSFAM 正在使用的權杖處理常式集合中的物件。The and properties are set by using the and properties of the returned in step 3 and are validated against the current time and the token lifetime specified by either the or the property of the object in the token handler collection being used by WSFAM. 透過設定中，可以指定在工作階段權杖處理常式的權杖存留期[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)項目。The token lifetime on the session token handler can be specified in configuration through the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element. 注意：上設定 SAM 未使用的 cookie 處理常式的屬性。Note: The property on the cookie handler configured for the SAM is not used. 7. 呼叫撰寫工作階段 cookie 的工作階段權杖的方法。Calls the method with the session token to write the session cookie. 方法的第一個會引發事件。The method first raises the event. 您可以變更工作階段權杖上的屬性，或變更是否 cookie 應保留在這個事件處理常式。You can change properties on the session token or change whether the cookie should be persisted in a handler for this event. 引發事件之後，方法則會寫入使用 SAM 的 cookie。After the event is raised, the method then writes the cookie using the SAM. > [!NOTE] > 組態中的設定不會用來寫入 cookie。The set in configuration is not used to write the cookie. 8. 呼叫方法以引發事件。Calls the method to raise the event. 9. 呼叫方法來取得要重新導向用戶端的 [RP] 頁面。Calls the method to get the RP page to which to redirect the client. 根據預設，這個方法會讀取之 wctx 參數中的登入回應傳回的 URL。By default, this method reads the return URL from the wctx parameter in the sign-in response. 如需有關如何 WSFAM 會儲存傳回的 URL 的詳細資訊，請參閱方法。For more information about how WSFAM stores the return URL, see the method.

(如識別為 rp 專屬 STS，請參閱屬性)。(For identifying the STS to the RP, see the property). 這個屬性的值會序列化為 WS-同盟通訊協定中的 wtrealm 查詢字串參數。The value of this property is serialized as the wtrealm query string parameter in WS-Federation protocol. 它會識別向 STS RP。It identifies the RP to the STS. STS 用來決定要針對權杖發行和權杖發行之後，重新導向至使用者的位置套用哪些原則。It is used by the STS to decide what policy to apply for token issuance and where to redirect the user to after token issuance. (如識別為 rp 專屬 STS，請參閱。)(For identifying the STS to the RP, see .) 您可以藉由新增的處理常式覆寫這項設定在每個 HTTP 要求事件。You can override this setting on each HTTP request by adding a handler for the event. 此模組會重新導向至安全性權杖服務 (STS) 使用 WS-同盟登入要求訊息之前，會引發這個事件。This event is raised just before the module redirects to the security token service (STS) with a WS-Federation sign-in request message. 所指定的 STS屬性。The STS is specified by the property.

summary.span: 當模組要將使用者重新導向到識別提供者時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the module is going to redirect the user to the identity provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以存取及修改 WS-同盟登入要求透過屬性。You can access and modify the WS-Federation sign-in request through the property. 例如，您可以修改變更要求會重新導向的身分識別提供者登入訊息中的屬性。For example, you can modify the property in the sign-in message to change the identity provider to which the request will be redirected. 事件可取消事件，而且您可以設定屬性設`true`取消重新導向。The event is a cancelable event and you can set the property to `true` to cancel the redirect. 事件引發時，從內方法，透過呼叫方法。The event is raised from inside the method through a call to the method. 若要處理此 ASP.NET 應用程式中的事件，建立呼叫的方法`WSFederationAuthentication_RedirectingToIdentityProvider`global.asax 檔案中。To handle this event in an ASP.NET application, create a method called `WSFederationAuthentication_RedirectingToIdentityProvider` in the global.asax file. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何將加入的處理常式中的事件`Application_Init`global.asax 檔案中的事件。The following code shows how to add a handler for the event in the `Application_Init` event in the global.asax file. 程式碼取自`FederationForWebApps`範例。The code is taken from the `FederationForWebApps` sample. 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For more information about this sample, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼顯示處理常式事件在 RP 的 global.asax 檔案中。The following code shows the handler for the event in the in the global.asax file of an RP. 程式碼會檢查以查看是否傳入 HTTP 要求包含 whr 參數，而且若是如此，它會設定此參數將會傳送至 STS WS-同盟登入要求。The code checks to see whether the incoming HTTP request contains a whr parameter, and, if it does, it sets this parameter on the WS-Federation sign-in request that will be sent to the STS. 程式碼取自`FederationForWebApps`範例。The code is taken from the `FederationForWebApps` sample. 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For more information about this sample, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼顯示處理常式事件中的的同盟提供者 STS 的 global.asax 檔案中。The following code shows the handler for the event in the in the global.asax file of a federation provider STS. 程式碼會檢查傳入的 HTTP 要求是否包含 whr 參數。The code checks to see whether the incoming HTTP request contains a whr parameter. 如果要求包含的 whr 參數，用戶端已導向至 IP STS 進行登入;如果沒有，則用戶端時，會導向至主領域探索頁面上，選取要登入 IP-STS。If the request contains the whr parameter, the client is directed to the IP-STS for sign-in; if not, the client is directed to a home realm discovery page to select the IP-STS at which to sign in. 程式碼取自`FederationForWebApps`範例。The code is taken from the `FederationForWebApps` sample. 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For more information about this sample, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).

summary.span: 將使用者重新導向至 屬性指定的安全性權杖服務 (STS)，以取得使用 WS-同盟通訊協定的安全性權杖。

span.span: Redirects the user to the security token service (STS) specified by the property to obtain a security token using the WS-Federation protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法從呼叫方法，從網頁上呈現的信賴憑證者的合作對象 (RP)，或從發出要求時上執行被動式重新導向至識別提供者的事件處理常式委派授權失敗。The method is called from the method when the request is issued from a web page presented by the relying party (RP) or from the event-handler delegate to perform a passive redirect to the identity provider on authorization failure. 傳遞給方法的參數用來建立訊息 wctx 參數。The parameters passed to the method are used to create the wctx message parameter. 只有重要的參數是`returnUrl`參數。The only significant parameter is the `returnUrl` parameter. 這會指定 RP 應該導向到下列的成功驗證的瀏覽器的 URL。This specifies the URL that the RP should direct the browser to following successful authentication. 不應混淆 wreply 訊息參數，以指定屬性並提供安全性權杖服務 (STS) 應將其回應導向的 RP 的位址。It should not be confused with the wreply message parameter, which is specified by the property and which provides the address at the RP to which the security token service (STS) should direct its response. 此方法會執行下列作業：The method performs the following: 1. 叫用方法，以確保有效的登入要求可以所簽發的模組。Invokes the method to ensure that a valid sign-in request can be issued by the module. 2. 叫用從模組上設定的屬性建立的登入要求的方法。Invokes the method to create the sign-in request from the properties configured on the module. 3. 叫用方法以引發事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 您可以取消重新導向，或修改登入要求訊息中以這個事件的事件處理常式。You can cancel the redirect or modify the sign-in request message in the event handler for this event.

span.span: A URL that identifies the address at which the relying party (RP) application would like to receive replies from the Security Token Service (STS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wreply 參數是選擇性的。The wreply parameter is optional. 如果屬性設定為`null`或登入要求中未包含空字串，wreply 參數。If the property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wreply parameter is not included in the sign-in request. Wreply 參數由 STS 用於決定要將使用者重新導向在權杖發行之後的位置。The wreply parameter is used by the STS to decide where to redirect the user to after token issuance. 不建議用於盲目地使用此位址，因為這類的重新導向的安全性弱點，將使用者重新導向至 STS。It is not advisable for the STS to blindly use this address to redirect the user as such redirection has security vulnerabilities. 回覆地址必須經過 STS （可能藉由比較一組預先設定的回覆地址的目的或透過其他方法），藉此確定傳送回覆至了解已知且安全的位置。The reply address must be validated by the STS (possibly by comparing to a set of preconfigured reply addresses for the purposes or some other method) to make sure that the reply is being sent to understood well known and secure location.

summary.span: 已經從安全性權杖服務 (STS) 收到安全性權杖時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a security token has been received from a security token service (STS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以新增事件處理常式來修改此語彙基元之前會進行驗證。You can add an event handler to modify the token before it is validated. 在事件處理常式您可以存取的安全性權杖，透過屬性。In the event handler you can access the security token through the property. 事件可取消事件，您可以設定屬性設`true`終止處理 WS-同盟登入回應訊息的事件處理常式中。The event is a cancelable event, you can set the property to `true` in an event handler to terminate processing of the WS-Federation sign-in response message. 會引發這個事件，從內處理從安全性權杖服務 (STS) 接收 WS-同盟登入回應訊息 ("wsignin1.0") 時，事件處理常式委派。This event is raised from inside the event-handler delegate when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") received from the security token service (STS). 從 wresult 或 wresultptr 參數在登入回應訊息中，但驗證安全性權杖之前，已還原序列化安全性權杖之後，就會引發這個事件。It is raised just after a security token has been deserialized from the wresult or the wresultptr parameter in the sign-in response message, but before the security token is validated. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#6)]

summary.span: 從安全性權杖服務 (STS) 接收到的安全性權杖經過驗證之後，但在建立工作階段安全性權杖之前發生。

span.span: Occurs after a security token that was received from the security token service (STS) has been validated but before the session security token is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以新增事件處理常式來修改它用來建立工作階段權杖之前，處理從安全性權杖服務 (STS) 的 WS-同盟登入回應訊息時所建立的主體。You can add an event handler to modify the principal created while processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message from a security token service (STS) before it is used to create the session token. 在事件處理常式中，您可以存取透過主體屬性。In the event handler, you can access the principal through the property. 事件可取消事件，您可以設定屬性設`true`終止處理 WS-同盟登入回應訊息的事件處理常式中。The event is a cancelable event, you can set the property to `true` in an event handler to terminate processing of the WS-Federation sign-in response message. 會引發這個事件，從內處理從安全性權杖服務 (STS) 接收 WS-同盟登入回應訊息 ("wsignin1.0") 時，事件處理常式委派。This event is raised from inside the event-handler delegate when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") received from the security token service (STS). 會引發此事件之後已從 wresult 還原序列化安全性權杖或已驗證登入回應訊息中的 wresultptr 參數，以及工作階段安全性語彙基元建立之前。It is raised just after the security token that was deserialized from the wresult or the wresultptr parameter in the sign-in response message has been validated, and before the session security token is created. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#5)]

summary.span: 根據從安全性權杖服務 (STS) 接收到的安全性權杖，已經建立工作階段安全性權杖時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a session security token has been created from the security token received from a security token service (STS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以新增事件處理常式若要修改的工作階段權杖，然後才會用來設定執行緒主體，並寫入工作階段 cookie。You can add an event handler to modify the session token before it is used to set the thread principal and is written to the session cookie. 在事件處理常式中，您可以存取透過工作階段權杖屬性。In the event handler, you can access the session token through the property. 您可以指定是否應該藉由設定寫入工作階段 cookie屬性。You can specify whether a session cookie should be written by setting the property. 會引發這個事件，從內處理從安全性權杖服務 (STS) 接收 WS-同盟登入回應訊息 ("wsignin1.0") 時，事件處理常式委派。This event is raised from inside the event-handler delegate when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") received from the security token service (STS). 會引發此事件之後已從 wresult 還原序列化安全性權杖或已驗證登入回應訊息中的 wresultptr 參數，並且會在宣告之前上設定主體(在的屬性).It is raised just after the security token that was deserialized from the wresult or the wresultptr parameter in the sign-in response message has been validated, and before the claims principal is set on the (and on the property of ). > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要操作工作階段在參考模式中，Microsoft 建議您提供的處理常式事件中的 global.asax.cs 檔案及設定傳入的權杖上屬性。To operate sessions in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 這可確保工作階段權杖會以每個要求的參考模式運作，且優先只要設定工作階段驗證模組上的屬性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從 要求處理管線實作中呼叫事件處理常式委派。Called from the request processing pipeline implemented in the event-handler delegate. 這個方法會執行下列動作：This method does the following: 1. 叫用方法以引發事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 若要修改的工作階段權杖，然後才會是用來設定執行緒主體，並寫入工作階段 cookie，並指定是否應該將寫入工作階段 cookie，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to modify the session token before it is used to set the thread principal and written to the session cookie and to specify whether the session cookie should be written. 2. 叫用方法上設定的工作階段驗證模組 () 設定執行緒主體，並選擇性地寫入工作階段 cookie。Invokes the method on the configured session authentication module () to set the thread principal and optionally write the session cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行刪除目前工作階段，並引發適當的登出事件的實際工作。This method performs the actual work of deleting the current session and raising the appropriate sign-out events. 方法會執行下列動作：The method does the following: 1. 叫用方法以引發事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 事件處理常式可以提供任何必要的處理工作階段遭到刪除。An event handler can provide any necessary processing before the session is deleted. 屬性設定為 根據`isIPRequest`參數。The property is set according to the `isIPRequest` parameter. 2. 呼叫刪除工作階段 cookie 在目前工作階段驗證管理員上的方法。Calls the method on the current session authentication manager to delete the session cookie. 叫用方法以引發事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 3. 如果登出的處理期間發生錯誤，會叫用方法以引發事件。If an error occurs during sign-out processing, invokes the method to raise the event. 事件處理常式可以取消處理，並防止在傳回給呼叫端的例外狀況 An event handler can cancel the processing and prevent an exception from being returned to the caller of 您可以呼叫方法`isIPRequest`參數集`false`登出工作階段，而不需要執行重新導向。You can call the method with the `isIPRequest` parameter set `false` to sign out of a session without performing a redirect. 所有其他多載的最後呼叫的方法方法 (使用`isIPRequest`參數設為`false`) 來執行處理登出。The method is ultimately called by all of the other overloaded methods (with the `isIPRequest` parameter set to `false`) to perform the sign out handling. 此方法會從呼叫方法`isIPRequest`參數集`true`登出工作階段時正在處理的 WS-同盟登出清除訊息 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")。The method is called from the method with the `isIPRequest` parameter set `true` to sign out of the session when it is processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up message ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"). 未登出要求 ("wsignout1.0") 傳送訊息給安全性權杖服務 (STS)。No sign-out request message ("wsignout1.0") is sent to the security token service (STS). 若要登出在 STS 使用 WS-同盟通訊協定，使用方法。To sign-out at the STS using WS-Federation protocol, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 刪除目前工作階段，並將瀏覽器重新導向回到指定的 URL。Deletes the current session and redirects the browser back to the specified URL. 叫用方法`redirectUrl`參數與`initiateSignoutCleanup`設定`false`。Invokes the method with the `redirectUrl` parameter and with the `initiateSignoutCleanup` set `false`. 未登出要求 ("wsignout1.0") 傳送訊息給安全性權杖服務 (STS)。No sign-out request message ("wsignout1.0") is sent to the security token service (STS). 若要登出在 STS 使用 WS-同盟通訊協定，使用方法。To sign-out at the STS using WS-Federation protocol, use the method.

summary.span: 當登出發生錯誤時引發。

span.span: Raised when an error occurs during sign-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過呼叫會引發這個事件方法內時登出信賴憑證者的合作對象 (RP) 工作階段的方法。This event is raised through a call to the method from inside the method while signing out of the session at the relying party (RP). 同盟登出功能，透過的這麼做時，不會引發事件方法。The event is not raised when doing federated sign-out through the method. 事件是否可取消的事件。The event is a cancellable event. 您可以設定若要避免這個例外狀況造成錯誤傳回給啟動者的登出事件處理常式中的屬性。You can set the property in an event handler to prevent the exception that caused the error from being returned to the initiator of the sign-out.

summary.span: 取得或設定查詢字串，包含 WS-同盟登出要求 ("wsignout1.0") 中要傳送的任何其他參數。

span.span: Gets or sets a query string that contains any additional parameters to be sent in WS-Federation sign-out requests ("wsignout1.0").

value.span: URL 片段包含其他訊息參數，以下列格式： param1 = value1&param2 = value2&paramN = 看值。

span.span: A URL fragment that contains the additional message parameters in the following format: param1=value1&param2=value2&paramN=valueN.

value.span: 預設為空字串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個屬性初始化自`signOutQueryString`的屬性[ <wsFederation> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md)組態檔中的項目。By default, this property is initialized from the `signOutQueryString` attribute of the [<wsFederation>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md) element in the configuration file. 它被要包含要在 WS-同盟登出要求中傳送任何應用程式特有的參數。It is intended to contain any application-specific parameters to be sent in a WS-Federation sign-out request. 若要移除這些參數，您可以設定此屬性設為空字串。To remove these parameters, you can set the property to an empty string. WSFAM 不會直接; 使用這個屬性不過，您可以將它傳遞給方法用來建立完整的 WS-同盟登出 URL，然後由您的程式碼。The WSFAM does not use this property directly; however, you can pass it to the method to create a complete WS-Federation sign-out URL that can then be used by your code.

span.span: An attempt to set the property to occurs.

summary.span: 取得或設定要在 WS-同盟登出要求 ("wsignout1.0") 期間使用的 wreply 參數值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the wreply parameter to use during WS-Federation sign-out requests ("wsignout1.0").

value.span: 登出後，應該由安全性權杖服務 (STS) 透過 WS-Federation 通訊協定將用戶端重新導向的 URL。

span.span: The URL to which the client should be redirected by the security token service (STS) following sign-out through the WS-Federation protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個屬性初始化自`signOutReply`的屬性[ <wsFederation> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md)組態檔中的項目。By default, this property is initialized from the `signOutReply` attribute of the [<wsFederation>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md) element in the configuration file. 它被用來代表 WS-同盟登出要求中的 wreply 參數。It is intended to represent the wreply parameter in a WS-Federation sign-out request. Wreply 參數是選擇性的。The wreply parameter is optional. 如果屬性設定為`null`或空字串，wreply 參數未包含在登出要求中。If the property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wreply parameter is not included in the sign-out request. WSFAM 不直接使用這個屬性。The WSFAM does not use this property directly. 不過，您可以將它傳遞給方法時執行 WS-同盟登出您的程式碼，或您可以將它傳遞給方法用來建立完整的 WS-同盟登出的 URL。However, you can pass it to the method when performing WS-Federation sign-out from your code or you can pass it to the method to create a complete WS-Federation sign-out URL.
